modName: How to Mod Skyrim 2 Load Order
descriptionHtml:
[youtube]H8IoIcWYA1U[/youtube]
"BOSS is the load order sorter of choice for most people, but has a better predecessor with LOOT.
Load Order is essential for keeping your game stable. But also, knowing what mods conflict with each other is important too.
Read the mod before installing, most mods have requirements and what they are and are not compatible with.
BOSS and LOOT are very helpful in auto-sorting known mod groups."
Credit to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1316352]Quinten Wolfe[/url] for summing that up as I forgot to mention that in the video. Thank you.

All links and credit to the song artists are in the video description on YouTube.
